item.description:
We're going to kick it up a notch next month with a new time for the meetup. So join us SUNDAY MARCH 7 AT 6PM.

ANY EXPERIENCE LEVEL IS WELCOME!! We always have some who have never played before as well as veterans. We will shoot for having a 202 board, but as always we reserve that board for those who have gotten out of the Rat Race at least five times.

We'll be meeting in the lobby of the Marino Rec Center at NU's campus. Just look for the tall shaven-headed guy with a purple RICH DAD bag!

There is parking on Hemenway Street. Even though it says Fenway Resident, I have never gotten a ticket there. However, if you do, you're on your own. If you have any trouble finding us, please feel free to call my cell (617-519-3163).

PLEASE BE ON TIME!!! We will start PROMPTLY at six.

We're looking forward to seeing you ALL there on Sunday March 7 at 6pm!

Russ
617-519-3163
item.name: REGULAR Cashflow Meetup -- New Time
